body.name: Comotomo Baby Bottle Bundle, Green, (7 Piece Set)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 20 hrs 28 mins
features: Comotomo's Baby Bottle Bundle includes two 5oz. bottles, two 8oz. bottles, and a package each of our slow flow, medium flow, and fast flow replacement nipples. (Replacement nipple packages come with two nipples each.)
Seamless Transition- Designed to mimic breastfeeding, helping babies easily transition from breast to bottle (and back)!
Designed to Latch - Truly wide mound with breast-like design.
Easy to Clean - Wide neck design making it the easiest baby bottle you’ll wash. Ever.
Anti-Colic Vents - Smart, non-leaking vents for consistent milk flow that help to prevent colic, gas, and spit-up.
body.description: Comotomo Baby Bottle Bundle (7-piece Set) is the perfect gift for expecting or new parents. Comotomo’s beloved bottles feature an innovative and sensible design to most closely mimic breastfeeding - making building your registry or gifting the right bottles a breeze! The naturally shaped, soft, silicone nipples are ideal for babies who have trouble transitioning from nursing to bottle-feeding. Your little one will love to hold onto the skin-like, soft and squeezable body that is like no other bottle in the world. These BPA-free baby bottles also feature a wide-neck design for brushless, stress-free, cleaning. They are equipped with truly innovative vents designed to prevent colic while completely eliminating annoying leaks. See why parents call Comotomo bottles “a game changer”!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best bottles
reviews.reviewText: These bottles are the best, they are so easy to clean and babies love them. The quality is also great, we have been buying them for years now and given them as presents to friends and family. This christmas we bought it as a present for a friend's baby who was struggling to take the bottle and these ComoTomo changed their situation and the baby loved it, not sure if its the shape or material that babies love so much. Just make sure to change the nipples accordingly with the babies age or if they get teeth early

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Premium quality baby bottles!
reviews.reviewText: It’s been 7 months using this baby bottles with our baby girl and I’m very happy with everything about It. They are made with the best quality silicone I’ve ever seen, It’s easy to clean, very durable and never leaks. Our baby girl handles It very easily when drinking by herself. This is the kind of product that will make you proud of your choice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars best baby bottles
reviews.reviewText: coming from a mama who breast fed baby #1 for 22 months and baby #2 for 4 months these bottles are amazing. soft, easy to grab, dont leak and best part... easy to clean! wish they sold these bottles bigger because once my son out grew them I had to switch bottle brands completely

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Or that's what I'm calling them.My three-month-old daughter has tracheomalacia. Which is a disorder of her trachea. It causes her to choke extremely easily on the slowest flow nipples. Along with colic and severe reflux. She paced feeds, so bottle shape plays a massive role. She's also breastfed, so nipple shape is just as important.We went through every single top of the line bottle you can imagine. Just like with my son. Nothing worked. She would scream, fight, and push every bottle away. The worse she choked, the more she averted the bottle.At the end of my rope, we decided to give another kit a try.We'd heard about these bottles, but I was afraid it was just another gimmicky style with the same problems. Boy ... was I wrong.She INSTANTLY latched. There was no fight. No wiggling. No holding it at a certain angle. She just took it. The nipple is definitely close to breast.My next worry was choking and flow. She still chokes some on the slowest flow, but nothing like she did with the other bottles. The severity and frequency of the episodes dropped dramatically. To the point where instead of refusing the bottles of fighting us, she takes right to it. The decent flow rate allows her to go more than her usual 5 suck and break pattern! NO other bottles have accomplished this for us.GREAT colic and gas relief. Which genuinely surprised me seeing as there is no long additional vent. Which means no 5000 parts to clean and lose! I feared that without the vent, that it surely meant we'd have gas. There's no way we'd get lucky enough to find a bottle that she loved, didn't choke her badly, AND didn't give her gas.Wrong again.This bottle is a flippin' miracle.Coupled with it's comfortable ergonomic shape and soft, touchable texture for baby - it's unbeatable.Get them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I used these beautiful bottles on my first child and ordered now for my second one. The bottles are super easy to clean, very lightweight so even infant can hold it easily , mu som loved it and was comfortably mixing breastfeeding with this bottle.The package is very good as it comes with topers with different flow , which i know i am gonna need whole tome until we use this bottles .

reviews.reviewerName: Es un producto fabuloso, de muy buena calidad, lo recomiendo, tiene varios compartimentos muy practico
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: De verdad son lo mejor, bebé debe succionar para poder tomar, lo que ayuda a la lactancia mixta, mas al inicio que cuesta que succionen, sin embargo fue de buena ayuda, práctico de limpiar, a la gravedad de una gota por segundo lo que lo hace ideal para los bebés y evita que se lo tomen muy rápido. De verdad los recomiendo a mil, mama primeriza

reviews.reviewText: Bought for my grandbaby who loves his bottles. He was some months old and holding his bottle while drinking the milk. Absolutely lovely

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good, but needs some work to be great
reviews.reviewText: We’ve been using the Comotomo with our (now) ~2.5 month old son. The good part is that the flow rate and venting have worked great. He is also able to move back and forth between the breast and bottle near seamlessly. Cleaning the bottle is also an absolute cinch, and generally speaking the build quality is good.Now, the not so good parts are that:a) For some god forsaken reason, the manufacturer has decided to put form over function when it comes to the measurement marking on the bottle. Since it isn’t colored in any way and blends in 100% to the rest of the bottle body, PM/late night feeds REQUIRE you to have a source of light nearby to see how much you’ve poured in/baby has fed. This is a major oversight IMHO making late feeds inconvenientb) Those same measurements….they’re off roughly by ~10ml. We supplement with ready-to-feed formula, once in a while. It is a 200ml bottle and when I put in a Comotomo claimed 100ml of formula the first feed, I consistently have a Comotomo claimed 120ml the next time…which means the Comotomo is overestimating by ~10mlc) The cap…the wretched cap! Why does it need to be so damn tight?! When you have a wailing baby in one hand and you’re desperately trying to pop open the cap with your other hand and it won’t budge without crazy force. Fail.I would’ve given this fewer starts, if it weren’t for the fact that the actual feeding has been going well with our baby.

These were the best bottles we tried for our baby who was about a month old. I exclusively pump and these limited her gas and were the slowest flow nipple we found. The kit was nice because they came with the selection of nipples for we can continue to use the bottles as she grows. Maybe a bit of larger investment upfront but money well spent.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very cute, but not very durable
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to love this product considering the price point, but my bottles and nipples have turned yellow within a months time frame (technically its less then a month since we were in the hospital for the first week of the month.) I looked it up and apparently it means that the silicon is breaking down already. I know bottles turn yellow over time but this is has been such a short time frame, its very disappointing.They were cute while it lasted but we most likely wont be buying again.
Used Product Delivered - No bottles were included (only received half of the nipples). For the price of the product - I expected sealed and new bottles.
Pretty expensive.. my baby does not like the long narrow nipple very much.. your baby could be different
Excelente kit para iniciar con biberones
